title: Pete's Fine Foods
description: Local grocery store formerly known as Pete's Frootique. Has a large selection of produce, a freezer section with vegan items such as Gardein and Amy's, vegan products like Tofutti and Vegenaise, a section of cruelty-free beauty items, some vegan-friendly snacks. A sushi section includes prepared vegan sushi. Juice and smoothies bar.
